Technical Consulting​

secureSTREAM designSTREAM

secureSTREAM –  Security is not an option anymore; security comes first to protect your customers and their trust on your brand Image.

  • Build a regular external security audit service for your customer's touchpoints, both on customer facing and backend systems & infrastructure. 
  • OR, use it under Security as a Service from the top security consultant with global market experience. 
Learn more Technical Consulting​

designSTREAM – End to end Digital branch consulting service that build your future banking targeting Generation Z.

  • Build a financial feasibility  plan for the transformation of traditional to digital
  • Run Design thinking to ideate the models depending upon country, city, area, type and target customer 
  • Select the technology that meets your consumer needs and integrate with your digital branch design 
  • Build the model branches and run for trial 
  • Prepare the successful deployment plan based on apporved and fine tune models and process.
Learn more Technical Consulting​
